Class Session

java.lang.Object
com.kelompok6.bakmi.Session
public final class Session extends Object
Session holds a process-wide reference to the currently active Customer.

This is a simple utility used to share the selected customer (DineIn/TakeAway/anonymous) across different controllers and screens. It is intentionally minimal and not thread-safe â€” it's suitable for single-threaded JavaFX usage.

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentCustomer

      public static Customer getCurrentCustomer()
      Returns the currently stored Customer instance, or null if none is set.
      Returns:
      the current customer or null

    • setCurrentCustomer

      public static void setCurrentCustomer(Customer c)
      Replaces the current customer with the provided instance. Passing null is allowed and will clear the session's customer.
      Parameters:
      c - the customer to set as current, or null to clear

    • clear

      public static void clear()
      Clears the session by removing any stored customer.
